statements: UPSERT INTO Manufacturing (product_id, product_name, quantity, price) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 100, 10.99)
UPSERT INTO Manufacturing (product_id, product_name, quantity, price) VALUES (2, 'Product B', 150, 15.99)
UPSERT INTO Manufacturing (product_id, product_name, quantity, price) VALUES (3, 'Product C', 200, 20.99)
UPSERT INTO Manufacturing.Part (part_id, part_name, quantity) VALUES (1, 'Screw', 100) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE part_name = 'Screw', quantity = 100;
UPSERT INTO Manufacturing.Part (part_id, part_name, quantity) VALUES (2, 'Nut', 150) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE part_name = 'Nut', quantity = 150;
UPSERT INTO Manufacturing.Supplier (supplier_id, supplier_name, part_id) VALUES (1, 'Supplier 1', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE supplier_name = 'Supplier 1', part_id = 1;
UPSERT INTO manufacturer(id, name, location) VALUES ('19a68c53-8f92-4e2b-8626-d052b7d9f27b', 'ABC Company', 'New York') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'ABC Company', location = 'New York';

UPSERT INTO product(id, name, price, manufacturer_id, created_at) VALUES ('fc3c15d2-49d5-40c7-8145-5a698906e078', 'Product 1', 25.99, '19a68c53-8f92-4e2b-8626-d052b7d9f27b', current_timestamp()) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Product 1', price = 27.99, manufacturer_id = '19a68c53-8f92-4e2b-8626-d052b7d9f27b';

UPSERT INTO "order"(id, product_id, quantity, order_date) VALUES ('b4a8fb2a-6da9-488b-ae6d-e3d25ab58e71', 'fc3c15d2-49d5-40c7-8145-5a698906e078', 3, '2022-07-15') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET product_id = 'fc3c15d2-49d5-40c7-8145-5a698906e078', quantity = 4, order_date = '2022-07-20';
UPSERT INTO product (id, name, price, manufacturer_id) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 20.5, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='Product A', price=20.5, manufacturer_id=1;
UPSERT INTO manufacturer (id, name) VALUES (1, 'Manufacturer A') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='Manufacturer A';
UPSERT INTO production_line (id, line_name) VALUES (1, 'Line A') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE line_name='Line A';
